title: Serif font from Typophile blog
content:
Hello,

I saw this picture from a book-cover on the Typophile, dating from the 29th of May.  
When I click to the link, an error occurred.

Could anyone help me with the name of this typeface?

Thanks,

N.

Font: 

 Weiss-ExtraBold 

Solved By: 

 [bojev](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417032140/http:/typophile.com/user/7409 "View user profile.")
